Watching Us

僕(ぼく)ら(ら)を(を)見(み)ていた(ていた)bokura wo miteita

"Humans never rest, they work even through the dead of night."
L

The story of a star observing the humans below her.

Lyrics

Versions

  • Original: The original version of the song released on vocantabile ~storia~ and later uploaded to niconico on February 2, 2013. It was then featured on The Muzzle of Nemesis.

Albums

Notes

  • The PV was illustrated by Yoshida Dondorian.
  • The song is based on Mimei Ogawa's "The conversations of stars one night".
  • The lyrics page in The Muzzle of Nemesis indicates that the song takes place in BT 3214.
